predicate.note: Frames file for 'descend' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to come down, lower oneself, or arrive

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: District police in 1983 descended on his suburban home , which he and his large family used [*T*-1] as both residence and factory , and demanded proof [0] the house and equipment were his .
